alert.note: Alert for Pushmataha (Oklahoma) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued July 13 at 5:00PM CDT until July 13 at 5:30PM CDT by NWS Tulsa
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 530 PM CDT FOR SOUTHEASTERN PUSHMATAHA COUNTY... At 459 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 6 miles southeast of Cloudy, moving south at 10 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations in or near the path include... Corinne... Sobol... The storm has been on a weakening trend over the past 10 minutes or so. If this trend continues, the warning may be cancelled early. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
